title: Collaborative Language Learning Model-Based Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level language proficiency and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing practical language skills through learner interaction, conducting problem-based collaborative activities in online/offline environments

learning_goals: Analyze real-world language use cases to design and apply context-appropriate communication strategies.
Perform complex language tasks (e.g., presentations, negotiation dialogues) through collaborative problem-solving with peer learners.
Systematically build a language learning portfolio using digital tools and propose improvements incorporating feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
